reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty and appreciate that the medium size fits perfectly. They describe it as really soft, with one customer noting it's not too warm.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: I bought this sweater for my daughter and it was so pretty and soft, I ordered myself two!! For reference, I'm 5'6" and 135 pounds and medium fits perfect. It's a good thickness for warmth too. Read more
items.author: nancy herrington

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!
items.body: Super cute! Soft not to hot, it’s a light weight sweater. Washed it, hanged to dry and the flowers were soft and fluffy …love Read more
items.author: Nicole Tucker

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Very pretty sweater, fits well, a little shorter than I wanted but still very cute. Material is soft and not too thick, more of a medium thickness. Quality is ok, not sure how well it will wash. Read more
items.author: Charlene P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice color, might want to downsize
items.body: I love this sweater. It’s a pretty cranberry red. I wear either a medium or large normally. I bought a medium and it still had the oversized look. Read more
items.author: K. Worth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice length. Not too short.
items.body: It was very comfy. Read more
items.author: Marina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater. Really soft.
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Can't wait to wear it. Want to get another in another color Read more
items.author: Dora Rodriquez Perez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks just like the picture.
items.body: Well made and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Leah R. Mayo

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight, doesn’t look or feel high end. Runs small.
items.body: I ordered a large and this style definitely doesn’t fit oversized - it’s more like a regular medium. I’m 5’10” tall and a size 8-10 and larges are my normal size. Seems like a Juniors. The sweater is lightweight - better for spring definitely not Fall Or Winter. I wanted to love this feminine design, but the material was not super smooth or comfortable without a cami underneath. The fabric and way the flowers sit on it makes it look like something I’d pick up at K Mart (for anyone who remembers that store). Not great value for the money and I would not pay full price for this myself. Read more
items.author: MB

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Baby Blue, Cream Beige, Yellow, Light Pink, Light Purple, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
